author: smishura
msg: Fix for HARMONY-1076 ([classlib][security] unexpected IllegalArgumentException for java.security.cert.X509CRLSelector().addIssuerName("w=y"))

author: jkuhnert
msg: The ComponentEventInvoker service wasn't filtering which methods to call when a particular event happened. It would only go
so far as resolving the component/page and called ~all~ @EventListener annotated methods. Oops. Fixed to be a little more discerning
in which methods/listeners it calls now.

author: jmsnell
msg: A number of general implementation clean ups to make it easier to manage.
Also, base the decision on what responses to cache based on the status code

author: grahamd
msg: (MODPYTHON-84) Further fix related to symlinks in req.sendfile() not noted

author: aadamchik
msg: CAY-623 - removing firebird adapter from 2.0 branch
